languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}, закрепленный на костюме Теодоры, внезапно оживает — до вас доносится только неразборчивый шум. Теодора морщится, касанием отключает передачу и властно кивает вам.{/n} "У меня есть некоторое время — до того, как {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} подаст сигнал к началу трансляции корабля из {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}, и мое присутствие потребуется на мостике".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}, закрепленный на костюме Теодоры, внезапно оживает — до вас доносится только неразборчивый шум. Теодора морщится, касанием отключает передачу и властно кивает вам.{/n} "У меня есть некоторое время — до того, как {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} подаст сигнал к началу трансляции корабля из {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}, и мое присутствие потребуется на мостике".

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}, закрепленный на костюме Теодоры, внезапно оживает — до вас доносится только неразборчивый шум. Теодора морщится, касанием отключает передачу и властно кивает вам.{/n} "У меня есть некоторое время — до того, как {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} подаст сигнал к началу трансляции корабля из {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}, и мое присутствие потребуется на мостике".

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time until the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} initiates the ship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time until the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} will give a signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉制服上的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯装置突然响了起来，但你只听到了无法理解的噪音。西奥多拉皱起了眉头，关闭了通讯，向你点头致意。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}还没有发出信号，虚空舰也没有开始跃迁离开{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}。我得抓紧时间去趟舰桥。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉制服上的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯装置突然响了起来，但你只听到了无法理解的噪音。西奥多拉皱起了眉头，关闭了通讯，向你点头致意。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}还没有发出信号，虚空舰也没有开始跃迁离开{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}。我得抓紧时间去趟舰桥。”

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} acoplado a la indumentaria de Theodora cobra vida, pero solo oyes un ruido ininteligible. Theodora hace un gesto de dolor, desconecta la transmisión y asiente, imperiosa.{/n} «Tengo algo de tiempo hasta que el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} de la señal para iniciar la transición de la nave para salir de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, momento en el que mi presencia en el puente será necesaria».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} acoplado a la indumentaria de Theodora cobra vida, pero solo oyes un ruido ininteligible. Theodora hace un gesto de dolor, desconecta la transmisión y asiente, imperiosa.{/n} «Tengo algo de tiempo hasta que el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} de la señal para iniciar la transición de la nave para salir de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, momento en el que mi presencia en el puente será necesaria».

languages.text: {n}シオドーラの衣装に貼られた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}が突然動き出すが、聞こえるのは理解できない騒音だけ。シオドーラは顔をしかめると、通信を切り、あなたに横柄な態度でうなずいた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}からヴォイドシップの平行移動を開始する合図をするまで、まだ少し時間がある。ブリッジにいる者たちは私の存在を必要としている」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}テオドラの衣装に貼られた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}が突然動き出すが、聞こえるのは理解できない騒音だ。テオドラは顔をしかめると、通信を切り、あなたに横柄な態度でうなずいた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}からヴォイドシップの平行移動を開始する合図をするまで、まだ少し時間がある。橋の上の者たちは私の存在を必要としています」

{n}シオドーラの衣装に貼られた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}が突然動き出すが、聞こえるのは理解できない騒音だけ。シオドーラは顔をしかめると、通信を切り、あなたに横柄な態度でうなずいた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}からヴォイドシップの平行移動を開始する合図をするまで、まだ少し時間がある。ブリッジにいる者たちは私の存在を必要としている」

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} accroché au vêtement de Théodora s'anime soudain, mais vous ne distinguez qu'un bruit inintelligible. La seigneure-capitaine grimace, coupe la transmission et vous fait un signe de tête impérieux.{/n} « Il me reste un peu de temps avant que le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} ne donne le signal de transition hors {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} et que ma présence soit requise sur la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} accroché au vêtement de Théodora s'anime soudain, mais vous ne distinguez qu'un bruit inintelligible. La seigneure-capitaine grimace, coupe la transmission et vous fait un signe de tête impérieux.{/n} « Il me reste un peu de temps avant que le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} ne donne le signal de transition hors {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} et que ma présence soit requise sur la passerelle. »

languages.text: {n}Das an Theodoras Kleidung befestigte {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} erwacht plötzlich zum Leben, aber du hörst nur unverständliche Geräusche. Theodora verzieht das Gesicht, schaltet die Übertragung aus und nickt dir gebieterisch zu.{/n} "Ich habe noch etwas Zeit, bis der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} das Zeichen gibt, den Übertritt des Raumschiffs aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} einzuleiten, und meine Anwesenheit auf der Brücke erforderlich wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das an Theodoras Kleidung befestigte {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} erwacht plötzlich zum Leben, aber du hörst nur unverständliche Geräusche. Theodora verzieht das Gesicht, schaltet die Übertragung aus und nickt dir gebieterisch zu.{/n} "Ich habe noch etwas Zeit, bis der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} das Zeichen gibt, den Übertritt des Raumschiffs aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} einzuleiten, und meine Anwesenheit auf der Brücke erforderlich wird."

languages.text: {n}Theodora'nın kıyafetine tutturulmuş {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} birden canlanıveriyor ancak tek işitebildiğin anlaşılmaz sesler. Theodora yüzünü ekşitiyor, yayını kapatıyor ve amirane bir tavırla başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}, geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyuttan{/g} çıkışını başlatmadan önce biraz vaktim var. Sinyali verdiğinde köprüye gitmem gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and my presence is required on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora'nın kıyafetine tutturulmuş {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} birden canlanıveriyor ancak tek işitebildiğin anlaşılmaz sesler. Theodora yüzünü ekşitiyor, yayını kapatıyor ve amirane bir tavırla başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}, geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}tan çıkışını başlatmadan önce biraz vaktim var. Sinyali verdiğinde köprüye gitmem gerek."

languages.original_text: {n}The vox affixed to Theodora's attire suddenly comes to life, but all you can hear is unintelligible noise. Theodora winces, shuts off the transmission, and gives you an imperious nod.{/n} "I have some time before the Navigator gives the signal to initiate the voidship's translation out of the warp and my presence is required on the bridge."
